ygData.messageBody:
Message: 6
Date: Fri, 24 Sep 1999 14:03:10 -0500
From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
Subject: RE: Gnoll Slayer Sword

Aaaaahhhhh...never noticed...alhtough I haven't fought reavers since like
18th level, and i'm 34 now. Thanks for the info...I wonder if the Skull of
J'hen Tra is that this guy is lookin for? Doubt it, but it's the only item
of worth I've ever gotten off these gnolls. A book and an eye...any clues on
this? There any named white gnolls out there in EK or Lake Rathe?

about named gnoll :

last night i was hunting at the gnoll reaver and undead reaver spot
and i have see a rare spawn a gnoll named splitclaw (no sure of the
exact name) it cons red to me at lvl 17. he also has summoned a
pet (a skeleton ) wich cons white to me.

They killed me helped with two reaver :(

i am really wandering what can we loot on him :)

Sure it s a rare spawn because i use to camp there.

that s my 2 cents.

Gdaor lvl 17 shaman on karana server
